data.title: What was the capital of Bahmani kingdom?
data.meta_description: Gulbarga Tughluq  founded the Bahmani  kingdom with  its capital at  Gulbarga in 1346 Thus in the fourteenth century two powerful kingdoms emerged in the souththe Vijayanagar and the Bahmani
data.text:
Q. What was the capital of Bahmani kingdom?

Answer: Gulbarga

Notes: Tughluq founded the Bahmani kingdom with its capital at Gulbarga in 1346. Thus in the fourteenth century, two powerful kingdoms emerged in the south-the Vijayanagar and the Bahmani.

4
